Articles.Content: I got the idea to design a small crew transport capable of getting to a 300km orbit that would dock like the Dream Chaser would have (should have) docked to the ISS. What do you think? (Will be stock in 0.25)
Look's awesome! Love the wings, the whole thing looks very sleek. How does it handle?

It doesn't turn very fast, but then again it's not a fighter plane. It's very stable though, no problems ascending, I can go straight up @45 deg (I use NEAR) without any pitch down for speed till 24km. The fuel capacity is just right on the edge of what I want, no wiggle room at all, I'm not sure yet how to fix it without messing the whole thing up. I'd like to have a little safety net in case I have an awkward rendezvous or something.
